issue.title: [Integration] Add WindowPandasUDFTests to Spark Integration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2914](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2914). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add PySpark tests for WindowPandasUDFTests to Spark Integration tests,.

Also, run the docker image against current Arrow master with patched version of Spark.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2914?focusedCommentId=16556235) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
running this now.  I should be able to close this after it completes.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2914?focusedCommentId=16556253) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Integration tests passed, I used this patch of Spark https://github.com/BryanCutler/spark/tree/arrow-upgrade-010

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2914?focusedCommentId=16556290) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2324
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2324>
